sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand.
As a qualified soldier, you must keep your uniform tidy and have powerful posture.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個合格的軍人，必須儀表整潔軍姿威武。

sentences.english: The King got two mighty falcons.
sentences.chinese: 國王收到了兩隻威武的獵鷹。

sentences.english: Would like to put on their spacesuits mighty showdown?
sentences.chinese: 想穿上威武太空服與他們一決雌雄？

sentences.english: The wounded soldiers showed much backbone before the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 受傷的士兵在敵人面前表現出了威武不屈的精神。

sentences.english: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個威武獵人主面前。

sentences.english: No galley with oars will ride them, no mighty ship will sail them.
sentences.chinese: 其中必沒有湯槳搖櫓的船來往，也沒有威武的船經過。

sentences.english: I'am in the drums loud and grand, the thundrous hooves across Nagra…
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壯的鼓，踏過草原無邊的納格蘭。

sentences.english: The mighty stone lion is sculpted out of large stone.
sentences.chinese: 威武的石獅子是用大石頭雕成的。

sentences.english: Mighty was very angry when he found out what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 威武很氣憤，他找到了發生了什麼事情。

sentences.english: Saw I your gait and saw I your sinewy limbs, clothed in blue, bearing.
sentences.chinese: 我看你邁開步伐看你威武之翼，身披盔甲，背起。

sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand, the thunderous hooves across Nagrand.
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壯的鼓，踏過無垠草原的納格蘭。

sentences.english: Standing straight towards the blue sky , kapok looks very tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 聳立向天，木棉給人一種高大威武的震撼感覺。

sentences.english: The eagle tripod is only 36 cm high but has a heroic image.
sentences.chinese: 陶鷹鼎通高只有36釐米，但看上去顯得威武而雄壯。

sentences.english: On a table by the side of the couch lay a mighty scimitar of steel.
sentences.chinese: 榻邊的桌上擺着一柄威武的鋼製彎刀。

sentences.english: Some even praised it saying the animal looked extremely "mighty and powerful".
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至稱讚這隻動物看起來極其威武霸氣。

definition: to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
variant of 氣宇軒昂|气宇轩昂[qi4 yu3 xuan1 ang2]
(of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
